ref: 13659 *skērayati ʻ scatters ʼ. &rcirclemacr &rcirclemacr G. kheravvũ ʻ to let fall, shed, cause to throw ʼ, kheriyũ ʻ scattered ʼ, kher, ˚rī f., ˚rɔ m. ʻ dust ʼ; M. kher ʻ thrown away ʼ, f. ʻ refuse, rubbish ʼ; -- Pk. khēri -- f. ʻ destruction ʼ?; -- N. khero ʻ destruction, waste, loss ʼ in view of Ku. kheṛo is < *kṣaya -- ḍa -- s.v. kṣaya -- . <-> X kṣōbha -- .
